cleaned_text: AROMATHERAPY ASSOCIATES Balance Replenishing Hand & Body Lotion 300ml AROMATHERAPY ASSOCIATES Balance Replenishing Hand & Body Lotion 300ml Enjoy softer and silkier hands with our velvety Hand & Body Lotion from our Balance collection. This vegan formulation contains a balancing, hand-crafted blend of Lavender, Ylang Ylang and Ho Wood to balance the skin's moisture barrier, and leaving behind an uplifting and relaxing aroma. Luxurious and easily absorbed, the nourishing Shea Butter will leave your skin feeling softer and smoother. The Balance range is also SLS and SLES free, and comes together in 30% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles, making it a collection that's good for your skin, and good for the planet. Suitable for all skin types - whether sensitive, dry or oily - this is bathroom companion that will impress your guests and pairs perfectly with our Balance Hand & Body Lotion.
